DOC.brief_summary: To determine co-administration subcutaneous ( SQ ) Insulin glargine combination intravenous ( IV ) insulin decrease time resolution ketoacidosis requirement ICU admission compare IV insulin delay administration SQ glargine treatment DKA .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Subcutaneous Glargine On The Time To Closure The Anion Gap Patients Presenting Emergency Department With Diabetic Keto-acidosis
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year Blood Glucose > 200 pH < 7.3 Bicarbonate < 18 Ketonemia Ketonuria Anion Gap > = 16 Age < 18 year Pregnant ESRD Prisoners Patients shock require emergency surgery Those unwilling consent trial Allergic Insulin Glargine
